content: fritillary by aparna rolfe the pearl-bordered fritillary is a butterfly whose orange wings are adorned with black spots and row of pearly markings along the edges this advanced-beginner level triangular shawl is worked outwards from the center of the top edge the delicate lace and iridescent beads capturing the spirit of a fritillary butterfly s wingspread finished size 56 along top edge
